law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 92, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994; ch. 405, sec. 31, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 353, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 377, sec. 2.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/94). This section was amended by 1994 Ky. Acts chs. 49 and 405. Where these Acts are not in conflict, they have been codified together. Where a conflict exists, Acts ch. 405, which was last enacted by the General Assembly, prevails under KRS 446.250.
